title.rendered: A Psychic’s Story Returns to Cincinnati’s Victory of Light Festival in April

content.rendered:
Looking for Angels: A Guide to Understanding and Connecting with Angels

Dr. Scott Guerin

Nichole Bigley, co-author and podcast host

Nation’s Top-four Spiritual Podcast to Showcase Upcoming Book Looking for Angels

The majority of people worldwide believe in angels. Our international study shows that 75% of people believe in angels, and of those, 36% say they’ve had an angel experience.”

— Dr. Scott Guerin

CINCINNATI, OH, UNITED STATES, April 14, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — For the second year in a row, A Psychic’s Story, a spiritual podcast in 195 countries around the world, returns to the Victory of Light Festival on April 15 and 16 at the Sharonville Convention Center. The podcast’s host and renowned intuitive, Nichole Bigley, will be there to meet and greet listeners as well as provide a limited number of in-person readings at booth #404. She will be joined by Dr. Scott Guerin, her co-author of the upcoming book Looking for Angels: A Guide to Understanding and Connecting with Angels.

“The majority of people worldwide believe in angels. Our international study shows that 75% of people believe in angels, and of those, 36% say they’ve had an angel experience,” said Dr. Scott Guerin. “Whether you are a true believer, a healthy skeptic, or somewhere in between, Nichole and I hope to share information about angels that resonates with you wherever you are in your spiritual journey.”

Join Nichole and Scott from 3:00 to 4:00 p.m. ET on Saturday, April 15 in Room #3 as they share excerpts from their book, including the history of angels throughout religion, science and psychology, true stories about angel encounters, and a first look at the data from the survey. Walk away with a better understanding of who is on your spirit team, including archangels, guardian angels and loved ones on the other side as well as how to connect with these celestial beings.

If you are interested in booking one of the limited in-person sessions with Nichole at the event, please email contact@apsychicsstory.com for more information about availability and/or to be added to the schedule in advance. If you are a spiritual practitioner who would like to be featured on the podcast, please stop by booth #404 to provide your information to potentially be interviewed in the future.

Location: Sharonville Convention Center, 11355 Chester Road, Cincinnati, OH 45246

Booth: #404

Dates: April 15-16, 2023

Hours: Saturday 10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. and Sunday 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.

Tickets: $15 per day or $25 for the weekend; tickets for children ages 9 and under are FREE.

Seniors and military receive a $2 discount with ID. Purchase tickets here.

Parking: FREE onsite.

Presentation: “Understanding and Connecting with Angels” with Dr. Scott Guerin and Nichole Bigley

will take place from 3:00 to 4:00 p.m. ET on Saturday, April 15 in Room #3.

The Victory of Light Festival, presented by Body Mind Spirit Celebration, is America’s largest metaphysical expo. Featuring more than 300 psychics, healers and holistic vendors the two-day event has something for everyone. For more information, visit bsme.net.

About Nichole Bigley and A Psychic’s Story

For the last 20 years, renowned intuitive and energy healer Nichole Bigley has been transforming lives, including her own. She is the creator and host of A Psychic’s Story, a top four spiritual podcast in the U.S., receiving millions of downloads a year in all 195 countries around the world. In order to help kids and teens shift their vibration, develop their intuition and become more empowered as a result, Nichole created a spinoff podcast A Psychic’s Story: Kids’ Edition. She is also the creator and host of Supernatural Matters, a global podcast that dives into the mystical and surreal, helping people determine what is natural or supernatural.

Looking for Angels: A Guide to Understanding and Connecting with Angels is Nichole’s first book with co-author Dr. Scott Guerin where they break down complex spiritual topics, making it easy to understand and incorporate into everyday life.

For more information, visit apsychicsstory.com, supernaturalmatters.com or go to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok and YouTube – @APsychicsStory.

About Scott Guerin

Dr. Scott Guerin has two master’s degrees and a doctorate in Human Development concentrating on spiritual development and is the author of the Angel In Training series – A Spiritual Journey, 12 Lessons, and two online courses with udemy.com.

He has been an adjunct professor in psychology for 22 years at Kean University in New Jersey. In addition, he has worked in the healthcare industry for 40 years, specializing in medical education and health psychology. The driving force in his life has been a passion for understanding God, Spirit, and his relationship with them. As a result, his life experiences and educational path have focused on spiritual development.

For more information, visit angelintraining.org.

About Looking for Angels

Written by Dr. Scott Guerin and Nichole Bigley, Looking for Angels: A Guide to Understanding and Connecting with Angels is a book that shares the history of angels throughout religion, science, and psychology. Through true stories, data, insights and expert tips, the book is an invaluable tool for anyone interested in learning more about these divine beings as well as how to connect and communicate with them.

For more information, visit lookingforangelsbook.com.

Media
A Psychic’s Story
+1 404-395-8810
email us here
Visit us on social media:
Facebook
Twitter
Instagram
YouTube
TikTok

You just read:

News Provided By

April 14, 2023, 07:23 GMT


EIN Presswire’s priority is source transparency. We do not allow opaque clients, and our editors try to be careful about weeding out false and misleading content.
As a user, if you see something we have missed, please do bring it to our attention. Your help is welcome. EIN Presswire, Everyone’s Internet News Presswire,

Editorial Guidelines
for more information.
